Array Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
Array< T >This template class defines a data structure for general arrays of arbitrary types
Array2D< T >A class for handling the special case of 2-dimensional arrays. The class uses a pointer matrix to increase the efficiency
Array2DReference< T >Class that implements references to objects of the Array2D template class
ArrayBaseClass arraybase serves as a base class for the template class Array< T >
ArrayIndexThis class defines index arrays for usage with the programming language IDL
ArrayReference< T >Class that implements references to objects of the Array template class
ArrayTable< T >Class for defining arrays, comparable to Array, but more efficient by using additional pointers as in class Array2D, but not only for 2-dimensional arrays, but also for 3-dimensional arrays
check_exceptionException class, that can be used to handle exceptions
